name: StarDrop (itch) (techvisiongames)
description:
StarDrop is an avoid and collect game full of stars. You must collect white stars and avoid the red stars to increase your score. You can collect up to 7 stars which you must drop off on the Mega Star. The more stars you collect the bigger you become and the more points you score. When is it worth it? It's up to you to decide!

Use mouse to move, and left click or press space to drop off stars!
